message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product to you, but I believe I can't pay more than $9,500 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,500 is unfortunately too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This is a fair price considering the product's value to both of us.  Let's try to find a compromise.
